statements: UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET market_trend = 'Bullish' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET market_trend = 'Bullish', trading_opportunity = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET market_trend = 'Bearish', analysis_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET trading_opportunity = FALSE, analysis_date = '2022-08-20' WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE market_trends SET closing_price = 150.25 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-31';
UPDATE trading_opportunities SET status = 'Closed' WHERE opportunity_id = 1001;
UPDATE market_trends SET volume = 50000 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND date = '2022-02-15';
UPDATE market_trends SET closing_price = 100.25 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE trading_opportunities SET entry_price = 50.75, exit_price = 55.25, status = 'CLOSED' WHERE opportunity_id = 101;
UPDATE market_trends SET volume = 500000 WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND symbol = 'GOOG';
UPDATE market_trends SET trend_name = 'Emerging Technology Trends' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE market_statistics SET market_cap = 5000000 WHERE symbol = 'BTC';
UPDATE trading_signals SET buy_signal = true WHERE symbol = 'ETH';
UPDATE technical_indicators SET rsi = 70.25 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
